SELECT m.id,p.姓名,m.content,m.dateTime,m.type, stutas from massage m INNER JOIN datacenter_personnel p on m.senderCode=p.人员编码 where addresseeCode=#{staffCode} and stutas<>"2" order by m.dateTime desc
